title: patool causes trouble while installing under virtualenv
body:
wanted to try install in a clean venv

```
(venv) 2 12411 ->1.....................................:Thu 29 Sep 2016 08:01:40 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad[master]
$> python setup.py install
...
Installed /tmp/venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad-0.3.0.dev1-py2.7.egg
Processing dependencies for datalad==0.3.0.dev1
Searching for patool>=1.7
Reading https://pypi.python.org/simple/patool/
Downloading https://pypi.python.org/packages/1b/eb/ad3c94cb8cbc1d8b1c47471d2c43537a05fda2bdff54a7d8248873591691/patool-1.12.tar.gz#md5=32a764139a018c6bc497b25630513a33
Best match: patool 1.12
Processing patool-1.12.tar.gz
Writing /home/yoh/.tmp/easy_install-2qM0Sk/patool-1.12/setup.cfg
Running patool-1.12/setup.py -q bdist_egg --dist-dir /home/yoh/.tmp/easy_install-2qM0Sk/patool-1.12/egg-dist-tmp-dfAqrZ
error: Setup script exited with error: SandboxViolation: open('/tmp/venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/_patool_configdata.py', 'w') {}

The package setup script has attempted to modify files on your system
that are not within the EasyInstall build area, and has been aborted.

This package cannot be safely installed by EasyInstall, and may not
support alternate installation locations even if you run its setup
script by hand.  Please inform the package's author and the EasyInstall
maintainers to find out if a fix or workaround is available.
```

doing `pip install patool` remedies it , so I could do again `setup.py install` to continue, which then finishes correctly
